fields_of_interest: Consumers, Energy, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Digital economy and society, Transport, Communication, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Among others, Directive 2013/11/UE on Alternative Dispute Resolution procedures and all legislation pertaining consumer policies.
organisation_name: Lisbon Arbitration Centre for Consumer Complaints (CACCL)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication:
Project regarding complaints resulting from "rental housing". 
Project related to consumer over indebtedness - helping consumers renewing payment conditions. 
Project related to tourist complaints.
goals__remit:
Alternative dispute resolution for consumer complaints, through legal information, mediation and arbitration. 
Member of FIN-NET for the resolution of financial cross border complaints.
